The acronym PPM stands for &quot;Parts Per Million&quot;. It quantifies the number of Satoshis per 1 Million Sats.

For example:

<pre>   1ppm is 1 sat per 1 Million Satoshis
   1000ppm is 1000 sats per 1 Million Satoshis
   4000ppm is 4000 sats per 1 Million Satoshis
   4000ppm is 1000 sats per 250k Satoshis</pre>
